name: pnp-copilot-pro-dev-resource-allocation
title: Resource Allocation Assistant
shortDescription: Resource Allocation Assistant is a declarative AI Agent that helps managers optimize team workloads and balance resource allocation effectively.
longDescription: The "Resource Allocation" declarative agent is a sample agent that helps managers optimize team workloads and balance resource allocation effectively. It provides conversation starters to help managers assess team workload, identify workload imbalances, optimize task distribution, manage high-priority tasks, prevent burnout and improve efficiency, and monitor and adjust workload.
